short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically suggests you and add the currently playing video to favorite-list!
short.es: ¡Te sugiere automáticamente y agrega el video que se está reproduciendo actualmente a la lista de favoritos!
short.fr: Vous suggère automatiquement et ajoute la vidéo en cours de lecture à la liste des favoris!
short.pt_BR: Sugere automaticamente você e adicione o vídeo atualmente em reprodução à lista de favoritos!
short.ru: Автоматически предлагает вам и добавить воспроизводимое видео в список избранных!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*************
Creates a playlist of the most visited videos on YouTube.
It is just searching your chrome history and based on number of times you re-visit the same video, it creates a playlist - Favorites Smart Playlist. 
**************
Also it can get your liked videos from your YouTube Playlist from your account with your permission to read that data. With a new feature you can also add some video to liked list.
This will require your permission to like that video. 
Also highlight video options added recently.
In upcoming version user can also sync other playlists from his/her YouTube account.

Note / Privacy Policy: 
The Autofavorite playlist, liked videos list read from your Youtube account and your identity data is no where stored other than your Chrome Browser itself. And even it is never shared to anyone. This is why it needs you to login to Chrome with your google account and so that this application sync data for this extension across the devices (all desktop Chrome Logins).

RELEASE-1.2.2
Added muti language support for 4 new languages - Spanish, French, Russian and Portuguese.
And fixed one minor issue of clearing videos.

RELEASE-1.2.1
Added likes and views count to video item in list view. Removed private videos from lists. Now user can store 100 Favorite and 50 liked Videos in listss. List count badge added to title of list. Auto sync of Liked list from User's account on first run is kept optional, user can do it from Options page.
In the upcoming release, we are bringing multi-language support as well.
RELEASE-1.2.0
We have removed Ad blocker from this extension. We will soon create a separate Extension for that.
RELEASE-1.1.9
Some fixes and Player tab is added and removed Download option as per the Chrome Web store policy.
RELEASE-1.1.8
View count as badge, UI elements redesigned, and some bug fixes.
RELEASE-1.1.7
Removed annoying alert and confirm messages and some fixes in action buttons on youtube page.
1.1.6
UI Elements redesign with theme change.
RELEASE-1.1.5
UI Elements Redesign and Search issue fix
RELEASE-1.1.4
Action button for adding currently playing video to added in playlist.
Search in Videos feature added and new menu designed.
RELEASE-1.1.3
Small fixes in all tabs view.
RELEASE-1.0.9
Automatically identify song category Song, Gaming, Sport, News etc and add an icon in list to identify that.
Popup option is added for playing video in popup window instead of new normal tab in browser.
long.es,ru:
Создает плейлист самых посещаемых видео на Youtube.
Он просто просматривает вашу историю Chrome и, основываясь на количестве повторных посещений одного и того же видео, создает список воспроизведения - Избранное Smart Playlist.
Кроме того, он может получить понравившиеся видео из вашего плейлиста YouTube с вашего разрешения на чтение этих данных. С новой функцией вы также можете добавить видео в список избранных.
Это потребует вашего разрешения, чтобы понравиться это видео.
Также выделите опции видео, добавленные недавно.
В следующей версии пользователь также может синхронизировать другие плейлисты из своего аккаунта YouTube.

Примечание / Политика конфиденциальности:
Список избранного, список избранных видео, считываемый из вашей учетной записи Youtube, и ваши личные данные хранятся только в браузере Chrome. И даже это никогда не передается никому. Вот почему вам нужно войти в Chrome с помощью учетной записи Google, чтобы приложение синхронизировало данные для этого расширения на всех устройствах (все входы в Chrome на рабочем столе).

What's new in 1.2.1
Added likes and views count to video item in list view. Removed private videos from lists. Now user can store 100 Favorite and 50 liked Videos in listss. List count badge added to title of list. Auto sync of Liked list from User's account on first run is kept optional, user can do it from Options page.
In the upcoming release, we are bringing multi-language support as well.

RELEASE-1.2.0
We have removed Ad blocker from this extension. We will soon create a separate Extension for that.
RELEASE-1.1.9
Some fixes and Player tab is added and removed Download option as per the Chrome Web store policy.
RELEASE-1.1.8
View count as badge, UI elements redesigned, and some bug fixes.
RELEASE-1.1.7
Removed annoying alert and confirm messages and some fixes in action buttons on youtube page.
1.1.6
UI Elements redesign with theme change.
RELEASE-1.1.5
UI Elements Redesign and Search issue fix
RELEASE-1.1.4
Action button for adding currently playing video to added in playlist.
Search in Videos feature added and new menu designed.
RELEASE-1.1.3
Small fixes in all tabs view.
RELEASE-1.0.9
Automatically identify song category Song, Gaming, Sport, News etc and add an icon in list to identify that.
Popup option is added for playing video in popup window instead of new normal tab in browser.
long.fr:
Crée une liste de lecture des vidéos les plus visitées sur Youtube.
Il recherche simplement votre historique de chrome et en fonction du nombre de fois que vous revisitez la même vidéo, il crée une liste de lecture - Liste de lecture intelligente des favoris.
Il peut également obtenir vos vidéos préférées de votre liste de lecture YouTube avec votre permission de lire ces données. Avec une nouvelle fonctionnalité, vous pouvez également ajouter une vidéo à la liste des favoris.
Cela nécessitera votre autorisation pour aimer cette vidéo.
Mettez également en surbrillance les options vidéo ajoutées récemment.
Dans la prochaine version, l'utilisateur peut également synchroniser d'autres listes de lecture à partir de son compte YouTube.

Note / Politique de confidentialité:
La liste de lecture Autofavorite, la liste des vidéos aimées lues à partir de votre compte Youtube et vos données d'identité ne sont stockées nulle part ailleurs que votre navigateur Chrome lui-même. Et même elle n'est jamais partagée avec personne. C'est pourquoi il a besoin de vous connecter à Chrome avec votre compte Google et pour que cette application synchronise les données de cette extension sur tous les appareils (toutes les connexions Chrome sur le bureau).

What's new in 1.2.1
Added likes and views count to video item in list view. Removed private videos from lists. Now user can store 100 Favorite and 50 liked Videos in listss. List count badge added to title of list. Auto sync of Liked list from User's account on first run is kept optional, user can do it from Options page.
In the upcoming release, we are bringing multi-language support as well.

RELEASE-1.2.0
We have removed Ad blocker from this extension. We will soon create a separate Extension for that.
RELEASE-1.1.9
Some fixes and Player tab is added and removed Download option as per the Chrome Web store policy.
RELEASE-1.1.8
View count as badge, UI elements redesigned, and some bug fixes.
RELEASE-1.1.7
Removed annoying alert and confirm messages and some fixes in action buttons on youtube page.

UI Elements redesign with theme change.
RELEASE-1.1.5
UI Elements Redesign and Search issue fix

Search in Videos feature added and new menu designed.

Automatically identify song category Song, Gaming, Sport, News etc and add an icon in list to identify that.
Popup option is added for playing video in popup window instead of new normal tab in browser.
long.pt_BR:
Cria uma lista de reprodução dos vídeos mais visitados no Youtube.
Ele está apenas pesquisando seu histórico do Chrome e, com base no número de vezes que você visita novamente o mesmo vídeo, ele cria uma lista de reprodução - Favoritos Smart Playlist.
Além disso, você pode obter os vídeos que você curtiu na sua lista de reprodução do YouTube com a sua permissão para ler esses dados. Com um novo recurso, você também pode adicionar algum vídeo à lista de favoritos.
Isso exigirá sua permissão para curtir esse vídeo.
Destaque também as opções de vídeo adicionadas recentemente.
Na próxima versão, o usuário também pode sincronizar outras listas de reprodução da sua conta do YouTube.

Nota / Política de Privacidade:
A lista de reprodução Favoritos automáticos, a lista de vídeos curtidos, é lida na sua conta do YouTube e seus dados de identidade não são armazenados onde não seja o próprio navegador Chrome. E mesmo isso nunca é compartilhado com ninguém. É por isso que você precisa fazer login no Chrome com sua conta do Google e para que este aplicativo sincronize os dados dessa extensão nos dispositivos (todos os logins do Chrome para computadores).

RELEASE-1.2.2
Added muti language support for 4 new languages - Spanish, French, Russian and Portuguese.
And fixed one minor issue of clearing videos.

RELEASE-1.2.1
Added likes and views count to video item in list view. Removed private videos from lists. Now user can store 100 Favorite and 50 liked Videos in listss. List count badge added to title of list. Auto sync of Liked list from User's account on first run is kept optional, user can do it from Options page.
In the upcoming release, we are bringing multi-language support as well.

We have removed Ad blocker from this extension. We will soon create a separate Extension for that.
